001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Optional;
006import java.util.Set;
007import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
008
009public record ProjectSpaces(List<ProjectSpace> values) {
010
011  @FunctionalInterface
012  public interface Operator extends UnaryOperator<ProjectSpaces> {}
013
014  public ProjectSpace main() {
015    return find("main").orElseThrow();
016  }
017
018  public Optional<ProjectSpace> find(String name) {
019    return values.stream().filter(space -> space.name().equals(name)).findFirst();
020  }
021
022  public ProjectSpaces with(ProjectSpace value) {
023    var values = new ArrayList<>(values());
024    values.add(value);
025    return new ProjectSpaces(List.copyOf(values));
026  }
027
028  public ProjectSpaces withSpace(String name, ProjectSpace.Operator operator) {
029    return with(operator.apply(new ProjectSpace(name, List.of(), DeclaredModules.of())));
030  }
031
032  public ProjectSpaces withSpace(
033      String name, Set<String> parentSpaceNames, ProjectSpace.Operator operator) {
034    var parents = values.stream().filter(space -> parentSpaceNames.contains(space.name())).toList();
035    var space = new ProjectSpace(name, parents, DeclaredModules.of());
036    return with(operator.apply(space));
037  }
038
039  public ProjectSpaces tweakModule(DeclaredModule.Tweak tweak) {
040    return new ProjectSpaces(values.stream().map(space -> space.tweak(tweak)).toList());
041  }
042}
